text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b3ea36c5bcb88b6a05a66347eedd461e9385103f|patch 8.2.1520: Vim9: CTRL-] used in :def function does not work>
patch 8.2.1520: Vim9: CTRL-] used in :def function does not work

Problem:    Vim9: CTRL-] used in :def function does not work.
Solution:   Omit count or prepend colon. (closes #6769)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1520: Vim9: CTRL-] used in :def function does not work · vim/vim@b3ea36c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1520: Vim9: CTRL-] used in :def function does not work · vim/vim@b3ea36c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: CTRL-] used in :def function does not work. Solution: Omit count or prepend colon. (closes #6769)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c2af0afff5c44969ad7611ec2d47d0f52087fa7f|patch 8.2.1519: Vim9: Ex command default range is not set>
patch 8.2.1519: Vim9: Ex command default range is not set

Problem:    Vim9: Ex command default range is not set.
Solution:   When range is not given use default. (closes #6779)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1519: Vim9: Ex command default range is not set · vim/vim@c2af0af
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1519: Vim9: Ex command default range is not set · vim/vim@c2af0af
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: Ex command default range is not set. Solution: When range is not given use default. (closes #6779)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2e80095501238e0c6b702ac7cdfa2e2b763dba28|patch 8.2.1518: Vim9: cannot assign to local option>
patch 8.2.1518: Vim9: cannot assign to local option

Problem:    Vim9: cannot assign to local option.
Solution:   Skip over "&l:" and "&g:". (closes #6749)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1518: Vim9: cannot assign to local option · vim/vim@2e80095
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1518: Vim9: cannot assign to local option · vim/vim@2e80095
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot assign to local option. Solution: Skip over "&l:" and "&g:". (closes #6749)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6c53fca02301ff871cddc1c74c388e23e53a424a|patch 8.2.1517: cannot easily get the character under the cursor>
patch 8.2.1517: cannot easily get the character under the cursor

Problem:    Cannot easily get the character under the cursor.
Solution:   Add the {chars} argument to strpart().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1517: cannot easily get the character under the cursor · vim/vim@6c53fca
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1517: cannot easily get the character under the cursor · vim/vim@6c53fca
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot easily get the character under the cursor. Solution: Add the {chars} argument to strpart().
